personal.name: Karan Khare
personal.summary: Highly accomplished Software Development Leader with 12+ years of experience across diverse domains, including Storage, FinTech, Autonomous Driving, Education, E-commerce, and Generative AI. Proven track record of managing and mentoring engineering teams while delivering innovative solutions.

experience.title: Senior Front-End Engineer
achievements: Spearheaded the development of GenAI features (Q Business) for AWS, focusing on meta-type file development for LLM
Developed internal tools and libraries (AWS Cloudscape, Q Design Suite, Quicksight LLM Prompt) to enhance reusability and maintainability
Led engineering discussions with stakeholders across Product, Design, and Customer teams
Improved operational excellence by addressing Operation Readiness Reviews (ORR) for the Q Business group

experience.title: Software Development Manager III
achievements: Managed a team of 9 front-end and full-stack engineers for the Devices FinTech group
Hired, mentored, and developed engineers, fostering growth and leadership
Successfully launched multiple financial tracking products, resulting in a 200%+ customer growth

experience.title: Senior Front-End Engineer
achievements: Established the front-end infrastructure and portfolio for 8+ applications within the Devices FinTech group
Developed asynchronous communication constructs for complex financial calculators
Contributed to the expansion of the data engineering group from 4 to over 20 ICs

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Migrated microservice-based applications from legacy to modern frameworks
Worked with Vue, Node, and Express
Optimized image and sensor data flow for data intelligence teams

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer Specialist
achievements: Developed responsive Web UI from scratch using HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, and AngularJS 1.5
Led UI development for SaaS storage orchestration on AWS and Azure
Contributed to API development using NodeJS, PostgreSQL, and GoLang

education.school: Questrom School of Business, Boston University

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science and Engineering

publications.title: Mobile gesture-based iPhone user authentication
publications.conference: IEEE BigData 2015, Santa Clara, CA, USA

publications.title: Behavioral Biometrics and Cognitive Security Authentication Comparison Study
